title: No Country for Amateur Athletics
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary: With Akaash out in Hollywood, special guest Spencer Paysinger (New York Giants, Miami Dolphins) sits in and talks about locker room culture, growing up in LA, playing with Jonathan Martin, the dangers of playing in the NFL and NCAA’s dark underbelly of paying college athletes. He also talks about his upcoming CW pilot based on his life with Taye Diggs
itunes:subtitle: With Akaash out in Hollywood, special guest Spenc…
description: With Akaash out in Hollywood, special guest Spencer Paysinger (New York Giants, Miami Dolphins) sits in and talks about locker room culture, growing up in LA, playing with Jonathan Martin, the dangers of playing in the NFL and NCAA’s dark underbelly of paying college athletes. He also talks about his upcoming CW pilot based on his life with Taye Diggs
